title:
The Legend of Holy Sword: An Immersive Experience for Concentration
  Enhancement
authors: Hirosuke Asahi, Ryoma Sonoyama, Chihiro Shoda and Nanami Kotani
abstract:
Concentration is significant for maximizing potential in any activity.
However, traditional methods to improve it often lack direct and natural
feedback. We propose an innovative and inspiring VR system to experience and
improve concentration. In the experience of pulling out the holy sword, which
cannot be achieved simply by force, the player receives multimodal
concentration feedback in visual, auditory, and haptic senses. We believe that
this experience will help the user confront his/her concentration and improve
the ability to control it consciously.
